entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Trail
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
